name: lopunnite
effect: Held: Allows Lopunny to Mega Evolve into Mega Lopunny.
short_effect: Held: Allows Lopunny to Mega Evolve into Mega Lopunny.

flavor_text.sword_shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Lopunny hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
